description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Insurance Adjuster Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in Trademark Infringement Case
cases.description: An Insurance Adjuster Expert Witness was not allowed to testify on likelihood of confusion between products as no testing was performed.

cases.title: Automotive Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Commercial Truck Standards
cases.description: An Automotive Expert Witness could provide testimony on commercial trucking standards, but could not offer legal conclusions.

cases.title: Emergency Medicine Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Distribution of Controlled Substances
cases.description: An Emergency Medicine Expert Witness was allowed to testify as to whether oxycodone caused a death.

cases.title: Cybersecurity Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Data-Breach Lawsuit
cases.description: Cybersecurity Expert Witness, who was a forensic accountant, was allowed to opine in a bank data breach case.
